DataSourcePortable.Name: Reinf - contador das tabelas de eventos
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand=" SELECT COUNT(R2010.HANDLE) QUANTIDADE, 'R-2010' EVENTO, R2010COMP.COMPETENCIA
 FROM REINF_R2010 R2010
 JOIN REINF_AUDITORIAS R2010AUD ON R2010AUD.HANDLE = R2010.AUDITORIA
 JOIN REINF_COMPETENCIAS R2010COMP ON R2010COMP.HANDLE = R2010AUD.COMPETENCIA
 GROUP BY R2010COMP.COMPETENCIA
UNION ALL
 SELECT COUNT(R2020.HANDLE) QUANTIDADE, 'R-2020' EVENTO, R2020COMP.COMPETENCIA
 FROM REINF_R2020 R2020
 JOIN REINF_AUDITORIAS R2020AUD ON R2020AUD.HANDLE = R2020.AUDITORIA
 JOIN REINF_COMPETENCIAS R2020COMP ON R2020COMP.HANDLE = R2020AUD.COMPETENCIA
 GROUP BY R2020COMP.COMPETENCIA
UNION ALL
 SELECT COUNT(R2030.HANDLE) QUANTIDADE, 'R-2030' EVENTO, R2030COMP.COMPETENCIA
 FROM REINF_R2030 R2030
 JOIN REINF_AUDITORIAS R2030AUD ON R2030AUD.HANDLE = R2030.AUDITORIA
 JOIN REINF_COMPETENCIAS R2030COMP ON R2030COMP.HANDLE = R2030AUD.COMPETENCIA
 GROUP BY R2030COMP.COMPETENCIA
UNION ALL
 SELECT COUNT(R2040.HANDLE) QUANTIDADE, 'R-2040' EVENTO, R2040COMP.COMPETENCIA
 FROM REINF_R2040 R2040
 JOIN REINF_AUDITORIAS R2040AUD ON R2040AUD.HANDLE = R2040.AUDITORIA
 JOIN REINF_COMPETENCIAS R2040COMP ON R2040COMP.HANDLE = R2040AUD.COMPETENCIA
 GROUP BY R2040COMP.COMPETENCIA
UNION ALL
 SELECT COUNT(R2050.HANDLE) QUANTIDADE, 'R-2050' EVENTO, R2050COMP.COMPETENCIA
 FROM REINF_R2050 R2050
 JOIN REINF_AUDITORIAS R2050AUD ON R2050AUD.HANDLE = R2050.AUDITORIA
 JOIN REINF_COMPETENCIAS R2050COMP ON R2050COMP.HANDLE = R2050AUD.COMPETENCIA
 GROUP BY R2050COMP.COMPETENCIA
UNION ALL
 SELECT COUNT(R2060.HANDLE) QUANTIDADE, 'R-2060' EVENTO, R2060COMP.COMPETENCIA
 FROM REINF_R2060 R2060
 JOIN REINF_AUDITORIAS R2060AUD ON R2060AUD.HANDLE = R2060.AUDITORIA
 JOIN REINF_COMPETENCIAS R2060COMP ON R2060COMP.HANDLE = R2060AUD.COMPETENCIA
 GROUP BY R2060COMP.COMPETENCIA
UNION ALL
 SELECT COUNT(R3010.HANDLE) QUANTIDADE, 'R-3010' EVENTO, R3010COMP.COMPETENCIA
 FROM REINF_R3010 R3010
 JOIN REINF_AUDITORIAS R3010AUD ON R3010AUD.HANDLE = R3010.AUDITORIA
 JOIN REINF_COMPETENCIAS R3010COMP ON R3010COMP.HANDLE = R3010AUD.COMPETENCIA
 GROUP BY R3010COMP.COMPETENCIA
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QUANTIDADE" From="A" Path="QUANTIDADE" /> <Field Alias="EVENTO" From="A" Path="EVENTO" /> <Field Alias="COMPETENCIA" From="A" Path="COMPETENCIA" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
